text: The V Velká Cena Masarykova (1934 Masaryk Grand Prix, V Masarykův okruh) was a 750 kg Formula race held on 30 September 1934 at the Masaryk Circuit.http://www.kolumbus.fi/leif.snellman/gp346.htm#38 All layouts of the Masaryk Circuit (Brno Circuit) between 1930 and today combined ==Classification== {| border="2" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="0" style="margin: 0; border: 1px #aaa solid; border-collapse: collapse; font- size: 95%;" !style="background: #f9f9f9;"| Pos !style="background: #f9f9f9;"| No !style="background: #f9f9f9;"| Driver !style="background: #f9f9f9;"| Team !style="background: #f9f9f9;"| Car !style="background: #f9f9f9;"| Laps !style="background: #f9f9f9;"| Time/Retired !style="background: #f9f9f9;"| Grid !style="background: #f9f9f9;"| Points |- ! 1 | 10 | Hans Stuck | Auto Union | Auto Union A | 17 | 3:53:27.9 | 5 | |- ! 2 | 18 | Luigi Fagioli | Mercedes-Benz | Mercedes-Benz W25 | 17 | + 2:56.6 | 9 | |- ! 3 | 26 | Tazio Nuvolari | Maserati | Maserati 6C-34 | 17 | + 3:46.2 | 12 | |- ! 4 | 32 | Hermann zu Leiningen | Auto Union | Auto Union A | 17 | + 8:37.3 | 6 | |- ! 5 | 4 | Achille Varzi | Scuderia Ferrari | Alfa Romeo Tipo B/P3 | 17 | + 10:41.0 | 2 | |- ! 6 | 20 | Ernst Henne Hanns Geier | Mercedes-Benz | Mercedes-Benz W25 | 16 | + 1 Lap | 10 | |- ! 7 | 12 | Wilhelm Sebastian | Auto Union | Auto Union A | 17 | + 1 Lap | 15 | |- ! 8 | 2 | László Hartmann | L.
